item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, May 19, 2025 at 10:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Goboscript, text-based programming language, compiles to Scratch (96 points | 26 comments)
2. Show HN: Every side project I've built since 2009 (19 points | 1 comment)
3. InventWood is about to mass-produce wood that's stronger than steel (110 points | 102 comments)

5. `This Printer company served you malware for months, called them false positives (91 points | 38 comments)
6. What does the end of mathematics look like? (25 points | 22 comments)
7. New research reveals the strongest solar event ever detected, in 12350 BC (180 points | 85 comments)
8. Spaced repetition systems have gotten better (882 points | 462 comments)

10. “There are people who can see and others who cannot even look” (139 points | 24 comments)

22. Spaced Repetition Memory System (224 points | 26 comments)
23. What do wealthy people buy, that ordinary people know nothing about? (2015) (184 points | 296 comments)

25. K-Scale Labs: Open-source humanoid robots, built for developers (101 points | 45 comments)

27. Hyper Typing (85 points | 59 comments)
28. Show HN: Vaev – A browser engine built from scratch (It renders google.com) (195 points | 112 comments)
29. Show HN: Python Simulator of David Deutsch’s “Constructor Theory of Time” (75 points | 10 comments)
